attributes.action: Remove the Tolls from the Tyne Tunnels
attributes.additional_details: The government must act to remove Tyne Tunnel tolls, which unfairly burden commuters and essential workers. While other UK crossings are toll-free, North East drivers are still charged for using vital infrastructure. With rising living costs, this extra expense adds unnecessary financial strain. The tunnels are essential, not a luxury—ordinary people shouldn’t be penalized for daily travel. It's time for fair, toll-free access to this key route.
attributes.background: The Tyne Tunnel tolls place an unfair burden on everyday commuters, costing drivers over £1,200 a year just to get to work. Other UK crossings have scrapped tolls—why not here? It's time to make travel fair. Sign now to demand toll-free access for non-commercial drivers!

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level. 

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this. 

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP 

And you can find out how to ask your MP to present a public (paper) petition here: https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/sign-a-petition/paper-petitions/
